home¶

filter¶

api.views.filter_zip_code.index(request, age_range, income, amenity)¶

GET http://<domain>/filter/<age_range>/<income>/<amenity>

Parameters:
  • request (requests) – HTTP GET Request
  • age_range (int) – age range
  • income (int) – income level
  • amenity (int) – amenity type
Returns:

list of ranked zip codes
Return type:

list[str]

kiosk¶

sports¶

api.views.sports_detail.index(request, zip_code)¶

GET http://<domain>/sports/<zip_code>

Parameters:
  • request (requests) – HTTP GET Request
  • zip_code (str) – zip code in NYC
Returns:

list of sports products
Return type:

list[str]
